title: Slow cooker pumpkin, pear and Gorgonzola soup
ingredients: ['1 medium pumpkin, peeled and cubed', '600ml vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 large pears', '200g Gorgonzola cheese, divided and crumbled', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon brown sugar', 'single cream, to serve']
